channel.title: CVE Feed for Sony Video & Sound Products Inc. -- Music Center for PC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sony Video & Sound Products Inc. -- Music Center for PC

item.title: CVE-2017-10892|2024-08-05T17:50:12.585Z -- sony%20video%20%26%20sound%20products%20inc. -- music%20center%20for%20pc
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Music Center for PC version 1.0.00 allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2017-10909|2024-08-05T17:50:12.639Z -- sony%20video%20%26%20sound%20products%20inc. -- music%20center%20for%20pc
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Music Center for PC version 1.0.01 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2018-0690|2024-08-05T03:35:49.095Z -- sony%20video%20%26%20sound%20products%20inc. -- music%20center%20for%20pc
item.description: An unvalidated software update vulnerability in Music Center for PC version 1.0.02 and earlier could allow a man-in-the-middle attacker to tamper with an update file and inject executable files.
